info.title: Legal Transactions
info.description: Legal Transactions are business objects that are used to manage the lifecycle of legal content. The service contains legal transactions, categories, category groups, parent categories, dates, entities, external contacts, internal contacts, linked objects, and relationships nodes. The information sent in the request as a payload, is used when creating a legal transaction, including appropriate checks for restricted values and authorizations. Once the legal transaction has been created, the legal transaction ID is sent in the response with the data included in the legal transaction. If there are any issues when the legal transaction is created, the system displays error messages in the response. Note that we support only deep create for the legal transaction node.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read and update legal transactions using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [SAP S/4HANA for Enterprise Contract Management(1XV)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1XV " Link To BP ")

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Enterprise Contract Management: Legal Transaction (LCM_LEGALTR)
* Enterprise Contract Management: Linked Objects in Legal Transaction (LCM_LT_LINKOBJ)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

get.description: Gets the details of all the legal transactions that are in the system. Details include title of the legal transaction, profile, context ID and so on.

parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expand related entities, see [Expand](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=63)

post.description: Creates a legal transaction. Note that only deep create is supported. While creating a legal transaction, you need to provide all the related attributes like categories, internal contacts, external contacts, dates and so on. Ensure you take into account  the mandatory attributes that are provided in the legal context and provide the values for the same attributes in the legal transaction payload. The payload should also contain "LegalTransactionSource" for which you must provide a valid value like "GA".

parameters.description: Universal Unique Identifier

delete.summary: Deletes a date using its UUID
delete.description: Deletes a date of a legal transaction using  its UUID. Note that mandatory records cannot be deleted.

post.summary: Creates a relationship between two legal transactions
post.description: Creates a relationship between two legal transactions. The payload should contain relationship type, related legal transaction ID and so on.

parameters.name: LegalTransactionRelshpUUID
parameters.description: Universal Unique Identifier

get.summary: Gets details of related legal transaction using its UUID
get.description: Gets details of related legal transaction using its UUID. Details include relationship type, related legal transaction ID and so on.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.summary: Updates relationship of legal transaction using its UUID
patch.description: Updates the relationship of a legal transaction using its UUID. Note that the values that are provided in the legal context cannot be modified in the legal transaction.

delete.summary: Deletes relationship of legal transaction using its UUID
delete.description: Deletes the relationship of a legal transaction using its UUID. Note that mandatory records cannot be deleted.

parameters.name: LegalTransactionUUID
parameters.description:
Universal Unique ID  
(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes and prefixed with `guid`, e.g. `guid'01234567-0123-0123-0123-0123456789ab'`)

parameters.name: LegalTransactionUUID
parameters.description:

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=152).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_LegalTransaction HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
